DataElement.preferredName: Microscopic Findings Domain Specimen Atypical Characteristic Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the atypical features found in a specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Microscopic Findings Domain Specimen Atypical Characteristic
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._Varying from the norm; not conformable to the type._The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Varying from the norm; not conformable to the type.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.
